title: I fix bugs :)
content:
I've found a cool security bug in ezBoard's site, which I won't post here to prevent ezBoard from killing my account. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Basically, it's a redirect bug which allows people to fool gullible users into believing their site is actually part of ezboard.com. Therefore:

ezBoard pwn3d by: [url=http://p072.ezboard.com/bpubliccommanderkeenforum.showUserPublicProfile?gid=grafix5000]grafix5000 [img]http://www.stephenarnott.plus.com/grafixlogo.gif[/img][/url] at: 1/7/05 1:49 pm

It must suck to realize your carefully coded site is being pulled apart by 13 year-old internet users. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img]
My [url=http://kevan.org/brain.cgi?grafix5000]MindBending Power[/url] is 5.43 points.
Go to [url=http://www.toxicsheep.com]www.toxicsheep.com[/url] to see my site!

[img]http://www.toxicsheep.com/sigs/scrobblersig.php[/img]

title: sorta
content:
Yeah, EzBoard's got a lot of troubles with it--one of the message boards I used to frequent had HUGE problems with people abusing the system. Signature files that stretched tables and auto-linked people to porn sites, ways to edit other peoples' messages, huge scrolling banner sigs... it was ugly. Very ugly... EzBoard's full of holes. Please be gentle with it!

--Xky

title: Re: sorta
content: [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img] I've never noticed those (mostly because I don't visit other places and this place is nice and clean). So how you discovered it?Life.. It's worth 20000 points!

title: Re: sorta
content:
I noticed it because a) I'm observant [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] and b) because Visa had a similar problem a month or two ago. (Not noticed by me, I found it on an anti-phising site)
My [url=http://kevan.org/brain.cgi?grafix5000]MindBending Power[/url] is 5.43 points.

content: Anti-phishing? Haven't heard of that yet, must read. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-foot.gif[/img] Life.. It's worth 20000 points!
